Author: pc
Content: MediaWiki is incredibly well thought-out and tested, and is pretty easy to extend. Most of the alternatives become unmanageable as the number of articles grows beyond a few thousand.

Author: vikramls
Content:
I prefer moinmoin - python-based, no need for a database and with per-page access control.

http://moinmoin.wikiwikiweb.de/
